page.title: 17CHARD JOB CENTRE
page.content: Joanne and I visited the Job Centre. The manager answered some questions. She told us that about 15 young people and about 15 people over the age of 30 come in to the Job Centre each day. Young girls usually want jobs like shopwork, nannies or hair dressing.Young boys usually want factory work or farm work.The highest paid local jobs are usually in factories.On average 25% of people who come in have the qualifications. A sample of jobs on offer in June were Engineering 12 ;Draughting jobs 2; Electronics 2; Sales representatives 2 Motor trade 4; Managerial 3; Building 3 ; Secretary 2; Community programme 5.
